comment: Actually seven year. Sweeter and more complex than the 4-year-old. Big barrel influence. a touch of menthol in the background. Cherries & anise? Like this a lot and I'd buy it if it was in Florida on a regular basis..a blend of 7yr 13yr 12yr. This is good enough that I bought a bottle, no hesitation.
Vanilla & Brown sugar nose, vanilla & cinnamon
